alert.note: Alert for Big Island Interior; Big Island North; Big Island South; Big Island Southeast; Kahoolawe; Kohala; Lanai Leeward; Lanai Mauka; Lanai South; Lanai Windward; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Central Valley South; Maui Leeward West; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai Windward; South Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 14 at 9:07AM HST until November 14 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY FOR PORTIONS OF OAHU MAUI AND HAWAII COUNTIES THROUGH TODAY... .Strong northeast trade winds will be especially gusty over and downwind of terrain. ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 35 mph with localized gusts over 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of Kahoolawe, Lanai, Maui, Molokai and the Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can tear off shingles, and can knock down holiday decorations and tree branches. Strong gusts can make it difficult to steer, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for localized power outages. Consider postponing hiking in the mountains.
